trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There were no other sightings in Tampa on or around May 17th 2013
Summary: i was watching a i guess it was a b52 flying by as they do on everyday but this one was every unusual
divs: Sighting Detailsit was a day like anyother day,iwas seating out side looking up at the sky like i do,it was so clear no clouds.so i am looking at a what i belive it to be a B52 flying across the sky.i was face west so i think i was faceing tampa fl.any way as i looking at this plane i always wonder what it is that they release from their engines someone told me once the it is call a jet stream.so i will go with that.anyway as i am staring at the stream i notice that at the end of jet stream there was a hot pink light following the jet so i said to myself this very wierd ,as long as i have seen this jets fly by never did i see something like this.i was just about to run and get my camara,this object just shot striaght up and disappear.in my opinion this was and will stress it a ufo .it was awesome,and i have to say this was not my first sigthing.i have seen others,but i do keep this to myself as others do not understand.
